front.title: High-voltage switchgear and controlgear -Part 37-082: Standard practice for the measurement of sound pressure levels on alternating current circuit-breakers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This part of International Standard 62271 provides methods for the measurement of sound pressure level produced by outdoor alternating current circuit-breakers in a free-field environment. These methods may also be used indoors or in restricted field, provided that precautions are observed in the measurement and interpretation of the results.
